thread.title: Very warm and inviting, Staff were extreamly friedly and helpful - Review
thread.title_full: Very warm and inviting, Staff were extreamly friedly and helpful - Review of Hotel 7 Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JustCullen
title: Very warm and inviting, Staff were extreamly friedly and helpful - Review
text:
From the moment we walked through the door we knew we were in the right spot for us.
The room wasn't overly large, however was quite suitable for the two of us and our luggage.
The window opening out to the street was great as we do like the fresh air while sleeping.
And I don't want to forget the 5th floor rooftop lounge area, where you can sit with a nice glass of wine or other beverage of your liking.
We would highly recommend this hotel for any traveler.
